title: Dear People saying any champion is "getting Nerfed to the point where "Olaf'd" or "Eve'd" is good"
body:
Reminder that Olaf use to have DAMAGE on his W instead of Attack speed, and his R use to reduce in a flat amount which was higher than what the armor would do, and lasted for 8 seconds max rank

Reminder that Eve use to only take 50% of damage from Minions and Turrets. imagine her building AS and AD.. She'd make Jinx look like shit.
